questions.question: Filter the charts, focusing on home game consoles. Then further narrow down the scope to only those platforms with high scores, and examine what common features they share.

answer.value: The platforms with higher mean of RPG are all very popular and have new and user-friendly products.

key_insights: Select the household game consoles with generally high ratings
The higher-ranked ones are all very popular and innovative products.

reasoning.reasoning: It was discovered that the home game consoles received high ratings. Tools were used to select and study them.
Using tools to study the common characteristics of the higher-ranked ones.

data_filtered.filter: indexof(["Dreamcast","PC","Nintendo 3DS","Nintendo 64","Nintendo DS","Nintendo DSi","Game Boy Advance","Game Boy Color","GameCube"], datum['Platform']) < 0
